description: audit: TASK: Evidence-based Implementation Audit for SuburbMates (NO ASSUMPTIONS)
goal:
Produce an audit report that enumerates what is CURRENTLY implemented in code + SSOT docs, so we can generate three authoritative artifacts:
1) State machine + UI copy table (states × pages × exact labels)
2) Studio Dashboard progression logic (stage → allowed actions)
3) Directory + Marketplace card contract (fields, states, disclosures)
